text: Petrus may refer to: * Petrus (given name) * Petrus (surname) * Château Pétrus, a Pomerol Bordeaux wine producer * Petrus (fish), a genus of ray- finned fish * Pétrus (restaurant), London * Pétrus (film), a 1946 French comedy film * Petrus killings, a series of executions in Indonesia between 1983 and 1985 * Petrus (Archbishop of Uppsala), third archbishop of Uppsala, Sweden, between 1187-1197 * Petrus, a band with Ruthann Friedman that performed in 1968 in the San Francisco area * Petrus method, a speedcubing method ==See also== *
title: Petrus
